body_html: I don't consider it a bug in sparse_palceholder... There's no automatic type casting in TensorFlow at the moment, which I think is the effect you're asking for. (If you have a proposed design to solve this general problem, we'd love to hear about it in a focused issue!)

body: I don't consider it a bug in `sparse_palceholder`... There's no automatic type casting in TensorFlow at the moment, which I think is the effect you're asking for.  (If you have a proposed design to solve this general problem, we'd love to hear about it in a focused issue!)
